docs.snippet: Pakistan's recently retired army chief Raheel Sharif has been appointed to lead a new Saudi-military alliance to fight terrorism, Pakistani media have reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan's recently retired army chief Raheel Sharif has been appointed to lead a new Saudi-military alliance to fight terrorism, Pakistani media have reported.

docs.snippet: Iraqi special forces battling Islamic State reached the eastern bank of the Tigris river in Mosul on Sunday for the first time in a three-month, U.S-backed offensive to capture the city from the militants, who still control its entire western half...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi special forces battling Islamic State reached the eastern bank of the Tigris river in Mosul on Sunday for the first time in a three-month, U.S-backed offensive to capture the city from the militants, who still control its entire western half.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces Reach Tigris in Mosul as Suicide Bombs Hit Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces Reach Tigris in Mosul as Suicide Bombs Hit Baghdad

docs.snippet: FIFA has proposed merging the CONCACAF and South American qualifiers as part of its plans to expand the 2026 World Cup, a leading official from the region said in a newspaper interview....

docs.snippet: The former president of a compounding pharmacy blamed for a deadly meningitis outbreak in 2012 put "profits over patients" and ignored repeated warning signs that drugs manufactured by his company were being contaminated by mold, a prosecutor told...
docs.lead_paragraph: The former president of a compounding pharmacy blamed for a deadly meningitis outbreak in 2012 put "profits over patients" and ignored repeated warning signs that drugs manufactured by his company were being contaminated by mold, a prosecutor told jurors Monday in a federal racketeering trial.

headline.main: Lawyers Trade Blame in Meningitis Outbreak Trial
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Trade Blame in Meningitis Outbreak Trial

docs.snippet: North Korea declared on Sunday it could test-launch an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) at any time from any location set by leader Kim Jong Un, saying a hostile U.S. policy was to blame for its arms development....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Korea declared on Sunday it could test-launch an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) at any time from any location set by leader Kim Jong Un, saying a hostile U.S. policy was to blame for its arms development.

headline.main: North Korea Says Can Test-Launch ICBM at Any Time: Official News Agency
headline.print_headline: North Korea Says Can Test-Launch ICBM at Any Time: Official News Agency

docs.snippet: The musical “La La Land” won a record seven awards, “Moonlight” won for best picture, drama, and Meryl Streep forcefully criticized Donald J. Trump....

docs.snippet: A people smuggler left 19 migrants, including five children, at a motorway parking area in freezing temperatures in southern Germany and fled the scene, police said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A people smuggler left 19 migrants, including five children, at a motorway parking area in freezing temperatures in southern Germany and fled the scene, police said on Sunday.

headline.main: Trafficker Leaves Migrants in Freezing German Motorway Car Park
headline.print_headline: Trafficker Leaves Migrants in Freezing German Motorway Car Park
